title: Add notes functionality to detail drawer
description:
Add notes section to tick-detail-drawer:

Features:
- Display existing notes in chronological order
- Each note shows: timestamp, author (if available), content
- sl-textarea for new note input
- sl-button to add note (calls addNote API)
- Optimistic UI: show note immediately, revert on error

UI layout in drawer:
- Notes section below tick details
- Scrollable if many notes
- New note form at bottom

Test: View existing notes, add new note, verify appears in list
acceptance_criteria: Existing notes display with timestamps, new note adds via API and appears in list, optimistic update with rollback on error
